description: A humorous take on an astronaut's need for space.
title: A Little Space Please
n_1: Leo feels claustrophobic inside the spacecraft.
n_2: Ava shows Leo the vastness of space through the hatch.
n_3: Leo enjoys a moment of freedom in space.
n_4: Sharing a light moment back inside.
c1_4: I guess I got my space after all!
c2_4: Just don't float away on us!
